original_text:
His back is made of rows of shields,
    shut up closely as with a seal.
korean_text: 그의 즐비한 비늘은 그의 자랑이로다 튼튼하게 봉인하듯이 닫혀 있구나

sentences.original_text: His back is made of rows of shields,
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 등은 방패들의 줄로 되어 있고,

sentences.original_text: shut up closely as with a seal.
